item.title: Fleet Management on the Web
item.description: Rising fuel costs in the current economy are putting a strain on vehicle fleet owners. However, by combining existing technologies, they can effectively monitor vehicle usage and performance in real time without breaking the bank. This gives fleet managers the ability to easily pinpoint areas for enhancing efficiency. This convergence brings together GPS tracking, onboard vehicle computers, and cellular broadband communication - technologies you likely already use independently. Thanks to mass production driving down costs, navigation systems are now commonplace in vehicles and even cell phones.
